card.name: Ziya, Expert Angler
card.text: Whenever Ziya, Expert Angler enters or attacks, draw a card, then discard a card. Ziya, Expert Angler gets +4/+0 as long as there are four or more creature cards in your graveyard.

card.name: Render Helpless
card.text: Choose one: • Target player sacrifices a creature or planeswalker. • Target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card.

card.name: Thin the Veil
card.text: Search your library for a nonland card not named Thin the Veil, exile it, then shuffle. If it has mana value less than or equal to the number of card types among cards in your graveyard, you may cast it without paying its mana cost. If you don't, put it into your hand.

card.name: Impossibility
card.text: Look at the top eight cards of your library. Put four of them into your hand, and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Practiced Forbiddance
card.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {2}. Spell mastery — If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, instead counter that spell unless its controller pays {4}.

card.name: Minyet, Hoardseeker
card.text: Haste Whenever Minyet, Hoardseeker attacks, create a Treasure token. At the beginning of your end step, sacrifice a permanent unless you've sacrificed a permanent this turn.

card.name: Walk with Grace
card.text: Draw two cards, then discard two cards unless you discard a noncreature, nonland card.

card.name: Reclaimed Academy
card.text: {T}: Add {U} or {R}. You lose 1 life. {2}{U}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice Reclaimed Academy: Exile up to two instant and/or sorcery cards from your graveyard. Create that many 1/1 blue Wizard creature tokens with prowess.

card.name: Maw of Unlife
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, surveil 1. Then if you have twelve or more cards in your graveyard, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token. (To surveil 1, look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard.)

card.name: New Divide
card.text: As New Divide enters, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters tapped. {T}, Sacrifice New Divide: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

card.name: Endless Breakthroughs
card.text: You may discard your hand. If you discarded at least three cards this way, draw five cards. You may sacrifice a land. If you do, copy Endless Breakthroughs.

card.name: Ravenous Ambition
card.text: Whenever you draw a card, each opponent loses 1 life, and you gain 1 life.

card.name: Deadly Deception
card.text: You gain 3 life. Destroy target creature. You lose life equal to that creature's mana value.

card.name: Deflect
card.text: Return target spell or creature to its owner's hand. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Accursed Pilgrim
card.text: Flash Lifelink When Accursed Pilgrim enters, mill three cards.

card.name: Winter's Silencer
card.text: When Winter's Silencer enters, target player reveals their hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Herald of Spring
card.text: When Herald of Spring enters, choose one— • Destroy target artifact or enchantment. • You gain 4 life. • Return target land card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Ruins Banshee
card.text: Menace When Ruins Banshee enters, it deals X damage to target creature or planeswalker, where X is the number of cards in your graveyard.

card.name: Roar of Seasons' End
card.text: When Roar of Seasons' End enters, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control. They gain trample and haste until end of turn. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Veilcrossed Claimant
card.text: Trample Whenever a player discards a card, draw a card and put a +1/+1 counter on Veilcrossed Claimant. This ability only triggers once per player per turn.

card.name: Wasteland Guide
card.text: When Wasteland Guide enters, mill four cards then return a land card from your graveyard to your hand. When Wasteland Guide dies, you may exile it. When you do, return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Magnificent Garden
card.text: Magnificent Garden enters tapped unless there are seven or more cards in your graveyard. {T}: Add {B}, {G}, {U}.

card.name: Empty Halls
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice Empty Halls: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. {3}, {T}, Sacrifice Forgotten Halls: Destroy target nonbasic land.

card.name: Arcana Unbound
card.text: This spell costs {2} less to cast if you control a Wizard. Exile the top two cards of your library. You may play them until the end of your next turn.

card.name: Brash Pyromancer
card.text: Brash Pyromancer has prowess as long as you control another Wizard. When Brash Pyromancer enters, if you cast a noncreature spell this turn, create a tapped Treasure token.

card.name: Learn from Dragons
card.text: Target creature gains trample until end of turn. Target creature gains haste until end of turn. Target creature gains first strike until end of turn. Draw a card.

card.name: Garden Fountain
card.text: When Garden Fountain enters, surveil 1, then draw a card. {1}{U}, Sacrifice Garden Fountain: Surveil 1, then create a tapped Treasure token.

card.name: Sent to Safety
card.text: Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. [b][Draw a card.] [/b]Rewrite {1}{U} (You may cast this from your graveyard for its rewrite cost. It only has the bracketed text. Exile it if it would be put into the graveyard this turn.)

card.name: Gloryscourge's Outrider
card.text: Prowess Whenever you sacrifice a permanent, Gloryscourge's Outrider deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker.

card.name: Living the Yaneta Lifestyle
card.text: Exile the top two cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play one of those cards. Create a Souvenir token. (It's an artifact with "Whenever a creature deals damage to an opponent, you may sacrifice this to put a +1/+1 counter on it.")

card.name: Dormant Bay
card.text: {T}, Pay 1 life: Add {U} or {R}. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Dormant Bay: Draw a card. Activate only if you control five or more lands.

card.name: Bum a Light
card.text: Bum a Light deals 2 damage to any target. If you attacked this turn, create a Souvenir token. (It's an artifact with "Whenever a creature deals damage to an opponent, you may sacrifice this to put a +1/+1 counter on it.")

card.name: Fortunehunter Captain
card.text: Whenever you attack, create a 1/1 red Warrior creature token tapped and attacking. Sacrifice two other creatures: Copy target spell you control that targets. You may choose new targets for the copy.

card.name: Gleeful Arson
card.text: Gleeful Arson deals 3 damage to any target. When a permanent dealt damage this way dies this turn, create a tapped Treasure token.

card.name: Wicked Blaze
card.text: Wicked Blaze deals 4 damage to any target. Exile the top card of your library. You may play it during your next turn. (Not this turn.)

card.name: Tamper
card.text: When you cast Tamper, if an opponent controls more lands than you, copy it. Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays {1}.

card.name: Wisdom's Warning
card.text: [b][Mill three cards][/b], then return a card from among them from your graveyard to your hand. Rewrite {U} (You may cast this from your graveyard for its rewrite cost. It only has the bracketed text. Exile it if it would be put into the graveyard this turn.)

card.name: Unwaking Mausoleum
card.text: When Unwaking Mausoleum enters, target opponent sacrifices a creature or planeswalker. At the beginning of your upkeep, if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard, you may sacrifice Unwaking Mausoleum. If you do, each opponent loses 3 life and you gain 3 life.

card.name: Her Oversight
card.text: Deathtouch {3}{B}, Exile Her Oversight from your graveyard: Destroy target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Vitin Orrery
card.text: Vitin Orrery enters tapped. {T}: Add {U}, {R}, or {W}. Put a stun counter on Vitin Orrery unless there are four or more noncreature cards in your graveyard.

card.name: Forgotten Stacks
card.text: When Forgotten Stacks enters, you lose 2 life unless you control two or more basic lands. {T}: Add {U} or {R}.

card.name: Imposing Copse
card.text: Imposing Copse enters tapped unless you control three or more other lands. {T}: Add {B} or {G}. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Forgotten Passage
card.text: When Forgotten Passage enters, you lose 2 life unless you control two or more basic lands. {T}: Add {U} or {B}.

card.name: Imposing Grove
card.text: Imposing Grove enters tapped unless you control three or more other lands. {T}: Add {G} or {U}. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Whispering Citadel
card.text: As Whispering Citadel enters, exile a card from your hand face down. {T}: Add {U} or {B}. {UB}, {T}: Return the card exiled with Whispering Citadel to its owner's hand. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Treasure PTXX
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice this: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Apathetic Edict
card.text: [b][Target player sacrifices a creature.][/b] You gain life equal to that creature's toughness. Rewrite {5}{B} (You may cast this from your graveyard for its rewrite cost. It only has the bracketed text. Exile it if it would be put into the graveyard this turn.)

card.name: A Simple Life
card.text: You gain life equal to the greatest mana value among artifacts and creatures on the battlefield. Destroy all artifacts and creatures.

card.name: Archmage's Will
card.text: Choose one— • Counter target spell. • Put target creature with mana value 2 or less on top of its owner's library.

card.name: Memorialize
card.text: Exile target creature and put a memory counter on it. It gains "{4}, Remove a memory counter from this: Create a token that's a copy of this except it is an enchantment instead of its other types. Activate only as a sorcery."

card.name: Maolong, Defiant Tactician
card.text: Protection from your opponents (This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, enchanted, or equipped by anything controlled by those players.) Players can't draw more than one card a turn.

card.name: Myth Realized
card.text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, put a lore counter on Myth Realized. {2}{W}: Put a lore counter on Myth Realized. {W}: Until end of turn, Myth Realized becomes a Monk Avatar creature in addition to its other types and gains "This creature's power and toughness are each equal to the number of lore counters on it."

card.name: Dormant Crag
card.text: {T}, Pay 1 life: Add {R} or {W}. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Dormant Crag: Draw a card. Activate only if you control five or more lands.

card.name: Waking Fen
card.text: Waking Fen enters tapped. {T}: Add {U} or {B}. {2}{U}{B}: Waking Fen becomes a blue and black elemental creature in addition to its other types until end of turn. Whenever Waking Fen attacks, defending player loses 2 life unless they discard a card.

card.name: Waking Shoreline
card.text: Waking Shoreline enters tapped. {T}: Add {W} or {U}. {3}{W}{U}: Waking Shoreline becomes a white and blue Elemental creature in addition to its other types until end of turn. Whenever Waking Shoreline becomes a creature, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

card.name: Imposing Tower
card.text: Imposing Tower enters tapped unless you control three or more other lands. {T}: Add {U} or {R}. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Imposing Rooftops
card.text: Imposing Rooftops enters tapped unless you control three or more other lands. {T}: Add {R} or {W}. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Whispering Port
card.text: As Whispering Port enters, exile a card from your hand face down. {T}: Add {W} or {U}. {WU}, {T}: Return the card exiled with Whispering Port to its owner's hand. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Dragon PTXX
card.text: Flying, haste

card.name: Spirit PTXX
card.text: Flying

card.name: Souvenir PTXX
card.text: When a creature you control deals damage to an opponent, you may sacrifice this. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.

card.name: Wizard PTXX
card.text: Prowess

card.name: Extradict
card.text: When Extradict enters, exile target creature or planeswalker until Extradict leaves the battlefield.

card.name: Biosphere Cultivator
card.text: Ward {2} (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2}.) {T}: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Oakgrove Superstar
card.text: {1}{W}: Put a lifelink counter on Oakgrove Superstar. {3}{W}{W}: If Oakgrove Superstar has lifelink, put three +1/+1 counters and a flying counter on it. It becomes an Angel. Activate only once.

card.name: Prince Beau
card.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, target creature gains trample and lifelink until end of turn. Memorialize {3}{G}{W} ({3}{G}{W}, Exile this from your graveyard: Create a Memorial enchantment token with its abilities. Activate only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Communal Defense
card.text: When Communal Defense enters, create a 1/1 red Warrior creature token. Whenever you attack with three or more creatures, return Communal Defense to its owner's hand. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on one of those creatures.

card.name: Whispering Village
card.text: As Whispering Village enters, exile a card from your hand face down. {T}: Add {G} or {W}. {GW}, {T}: Return the card exiled with Whispering Citadel to its owner's hand. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Whispering Clearing
card.text: As Whispering Clearing enters, exile a card from your hand face down. {T}: Add {R} or {G}. {RG}, {T}: Return the card exiled with Whispering Clearing to its owner's hand. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Forgotten Arch
card.text: When Forgotten Arch enters, you lose 2 life unless you control two or more basic lands. {T}: Add {R} or {G}.

card.name: Whisper Parade
card.text: When Whisper Parade enters, create two 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying. {4}{W}: Create two 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying. Activate only as a sorcery and only if you control no creature tokens.

card.name: Rouser of Mortals
card.text: Flying Whenever Rouser of Mortals or another creature you control becomes the target of a spell or ability you don't control, it deals 3 damage to that ability's controller.

card.name: Life of the Party
card.text: Haste When Life of the Party enters, create two Souvenir tokens. (They're artifacts with "Whenever a creature deals damage to an opponent, you may sacrifice this to put a +1/+1 counter on it.") Whenever Life of the Party attacks, you may sacrifice a permanent. If you do, exile the top card of your library. You may play it until end of turn.

card.name: Maolong's Disciple
card.text: Flash Each player can't cast more than one spell each turn.

card.name: Taldon's Touch
card.text: Extract 2 (As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may pay 2 life.) Choose one. If this spell was extracted, instead choose both— • Exile target artifact. • Taldon's Touch deals 3 damage to target player or planeswalker.

card.name: Shrine to Freedom
card.text: When Shrine to Freedom enters or when you cast a spell, exile up to one target card in a graveyard. {T}, Sacrifice Shrine to Freedom: If there are four or more card types among cards exiled with Shrine to Freedom, draw a card. Then, exile each opponent's graveyard.

card.name: Achievement Antithesis
card.text: This spell costs {1} less to cast if a player has 10 or less life. Counter target instant, sorcery, enchantment, or planeswalker spell.

card.name: Scarlet District Punk
card.text: Haste Players can't gain life. Whenever you attack with three or more creatures, creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Retired Monsterhunter
card.text: If a spell or ability an opponent controls would cause you to discard a creature card, instead you may put Retired Monsterhunter from your hand onto the battlefield. Vigilance

card.name: The Chapter Ends
card.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. If it was a token, draw a card.

card.name: Scorching Superiority
card.text: Scorching Superiority deals 2 damage to each non-Dragon creature. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.

card.name: Dream of Oblivion
card.text: Extract 3 (As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may pay 3 life.) Creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn. If this spell was extracted, they get -4/-4 until end of turn instead.

card.name: Malediction
card.text: Creatures your opponents control get -2/-2 until end of turn. At the beginning of the next end step, if three or more creatures died this turn, you gain 4 life.

card.name: Pluck Thoughts
card.text: [b][Target opponent reveals their hand and discards a nonland card.][/b] They lose 1 life. Rewrite {2}{B} (You may cast this from your graveyard for its rewrite cost. It only has the bracketed text. Exile it if it would be put into the graveyard this turn.)

card.name: Apex Films Dealbroker
card.text: This spell can't be countered. When Apex Films Dealbroker enters, target opponent reveals their hand. Exile a nonland card revealed this way until Apex Films Dealbroker leaves the battlefield. When Apex Films Dealbroker dies, target opponent discards a card. (After returning the exiled card.)

card.name: Spiteful Sprite
card.text: Extract 2 (As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may pay 2 life.) Flash Flying When this enters, if it was extracted, return target noncreature spell to its owner's hand.

card.name: Captivating Count
card.text: Lifelink When Captivating Count enters, create a 1/1 black Serf creature token with "This creature can't attack or block alone."

card.name: Serf PTXX
card.text: This creature can't attack or block alone.
